data.title: Youth Time Magazine: News that Inspires, Updates that Matter
data.meta_description: Youth Time Magazine is an online platform for young people, run by young people. Explore the updates on lifestyle, news, tech, & more that matter to youth.
data.meta_site_name: Youth Time Magazine: News that Inspires, Updates that Matter
